__commenttmtdir: tmt_dir specifies the path where code snapshots and results will be saved. You may specify an absolute path as well.
__commenttarget: snapshot_target is where code snapshots will be saved. It will be joined with tmt_dir. So in this case the target will be .examples/snapshot_example.
__comment_link: this path will be a sym link to the last snapshot taken. Same rules as for snapshot_target apply
__comment_gitignore: this can be any gitignore-like file, or just empty if you don't want to ignore anything
__comment_json_result: the two paths below are for the db and the results directory, respectively. Same rules apply as for snapshot_target, so path will be .example/example_db.json
